text: The Book of Dust - La Belle Sauvage is an upcoming play by Bryony Lavery based on the 2017 fantasy novel of the same name by Philip Pullman which is the first part of The Book of Dust trilogy (set twelve years before Pullman's His Dark Materials). == Production == The world premiere of the play was originally scheduled to begin previews at the Bridge Theatre, London from 11 July (with an official opening night on 23 July) running until 10 October 2020, however due to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, performances have been postponed until when the theatre reopens. The production will be directed by Nicholas Hytner, who also directed the stage adaptation of His Dark Materials at the National Theatre, London in 2003 and 2004. == References == Category:Plays based on novels Category:British plays Category:His Dark Materials
